title: Eddie Van Der Walt on Electric Cars (Audio)
itunes:title: Eddie Van Der Walt on Electric Cars (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Eddie van Der Walt\u0010Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss his story on how the electric car revolution is shaking up the biggest metal markets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
